alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 2:54AM CDT until March 25 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 2 PM EDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 2 PM EDT Saturday. For the first Wind Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 2 PM to 8 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi
